caption: This is a drum & bass music piece. There is a female vocal sample that is being played repetitively. The main theme is being played by a keyboard while there is a strong bass in the background. The rhythmic background consists of a very fast tempo electronic drum beat. The atmosphere is modern. This piece could be played at nightclubs, at drum & bass events and in DJ sets. It could also work well in the soundtrack of a futuristic movie or a car racing video game.
